mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUBMIT_HW( SUBMITHWNUM, SUBMITDATE, HWNUM, STUDENTNUM, ADDFILEID, SUBMITNAME, SUBMITINFO ) VALUES( SEQ_SUBMITNUM.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{hwnum}, #{studentnum}, #{addfileid}, #{submitname}, #{submitinfo} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE SUBMIT_HW SET SUBMITDATE= SYSDATE, HWNUM= #{hwnum}, STUDENTNUM= #{studentnum}, ADDFILEID= #{addfileid}, SUBMITNAME= #{submitname}, SUBMITINFO= #{submitinfo}
WHERE SUBMITHWNUM= #{submithwnum}
mapper.select: SELECT S.SUBMITHWNUM SUBMITHWNUM, S.SUBMITDATE, S.HWNUM, S.STUDENTNUM, S.SUBMITNAME, S.SUBMITINFO, ( SELECT ADDFILENAME FROM ADDFILE A WHERE A.ADDFILEID=S.ADDFILEID) ADDFILEID FROM SUBMIT_HW S WHERE STUDENTNUM= #{studentnum} AND HWNUM= #{hwnum}

SELECT A.*, B.SUBMITHWNUM SUBMITHWNUM, B.SUBMITNAME SUBMITNAME, B.SUBMITINFO SUBMITINFO, B.ADDFILEID ADDFILEID, CASE WHEN B.HWNUM IS NULL THEN '미제출' ELSE '제출' END SUBMIT
FROM ( SELECT S.STUDENTNUM, S.STUDENTNAME, C.CLASSNUM, H.HWNUM FROM STUDENT S JOIN CLASSAPPLY C ON S.STUDENTNUM = C.STUDENTNUM JOIN HW H ON H.CLASSNUM = C.CLASSNUM WHERE 1=1
AND H.HWNUM LIKE '%' || #{hwnum} || '%'
ORDER BY HWNUM) A
LEFT OUTER JOIN SUBMIT_HW B ON (A.STUDENTNUM = B.STUDENTNUM AND A.HWNUM = B.HWNUM)
